mean_cn: n. 证言，沉积物，矿床，革职
mean_en: a formal statement that is made before a trial by a witness who will not be present at the trial
word_etyma: deposit沉淀 + ion名词后缀 → deposition 沉淀
short_phrase: The lawyers look at the written deposition.
sentence: I gave the lawyers a written deposition about the crime I had witnessed.
sentence_trans: 我给律师一份关于我目击犯罪的书面证词。
